title: Only She Thinks This World is an Otome Game - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Male Yandere   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 弥生
description:
On her seventh birthday, Lilia, the daughter of a Duke, remembers something terrible. She’s been reincarnated as a villainess in an otome game. In the game, she was a queen candidate that abused her power, but in the end—after all her wrongdoings were exposed—she was condemned.

I want to break this death flag somehow!

She insists on getting engaged to Clark, the son of a frontier count before she’s betrothed to the first prince. But what she didn’t realize is that Clark was a potential capture target…a tsundere who has grown up to be a splendid yandere.

This is the story of Lilia—who believes that this world is an otome game—and Clark, who tries to fulfill her wishes.>
